header: Christ Set Us Free, So Stand Firm In Faith. If You Pursue The Law, Christ Will Not Profit You

verse: Christ set us free for freedom. Therefore be standing-firm, and do not again be held-in a yoke of slavery.
Behold— I, Paul, say to you that if you receive-circumcision, Christ will profit you nothing.
And I testify again to every man receiving-circumcision that he is a debtor to do the whole Law.
You who are [trying to be] declared-righteous by the Law were alienated from Christ. You fell-from grace.
For by  the Spirit, by faith, we are eagerly-awaiting the hope of righteousness.
For in Christ Jesus neither circumcision nor uncircumcision can-do anything, but faith working through love.

header: Who Hindered You From Believing The Truth? He Will Bear His Judgment

verse: You were running well. Who hindered you that you should not be persuaded by the truth?
The persuasion is not from the One calling you!
A little leaven leavens the whole lump.
I am persuaded with reference to you in the Lord that you will think no other thing. But the one disturbing you will bear the judgment, whoever he may be.
But I, brothers, if I am still proclaiming circumcision, why am I still being persecuted? Then the offense of  the cross has been abolished.
O-that the ones upsetting you would indeed cut-themselves-off !

header: Use Your Freedom To Serve One Another In Love, Not As an Opportunity For The Flesh

verse: For you were called for freedom, brothers, only do not use the freedom for an opportunity for the flesh, but be serving one another through love.
For the whole Law has been fulfilled in one saying— in the “You shall love your neighbor as yourself ” [Lev 19:18].
But if you are biting and devouring one another, watch out that you may not be consumed by one another!

header: Walk By The Spirit And You Will Not Fulfill The Flesh’s Desires Or Be Under The Law

verse: And I say— be walking by the Spirit and you will never fulfill the desire of  the flesh.
For the flesh desires against the Spirit and the Spirit against the flesh. For these are contrary to one another in-order-that you might not be doing these things which you may be wanting.
But if you are being led by the Spirit, you are not under the Law.

header: Those Who Practice The Works of The Flesh Will Not Inherit God’s Kingdom

verse: Now the works of the flesh are evident, which are sexual-immorality, impurity, sensuality,
idolatry, sorcery, hostilities, strife, jealousy, rages, selfish-interests, dissentions, factions,
envy, drunkenness, revelries, and the things like these— as to which things I tell you beforehand, just as I said-before, that the ones practicing such things will not inherit the kingdom of God.

header: Those In Christ Crucified The Flesh And Bear The Fruit of Living By The Spirit

verse: But the fruit of  the Spirit is love, joy, peace, patience, kindness, goodness, faithfulness,
gentleness, self-control. Against such things there is no law.
And the ones of  Christ Jesus crucified the flesh, with its passions and desires.
If we are living by the Spirit, let us also be walking-in-line with the Spirit.

header: Don’t Be Conceited. Humbly Care For One Another And You Will Fulfill Christ’s Law

verse: Let us not become conceited ones, challenging one another, envying one another.
